keepsNodes.title: get
keepsNodes.description: Gets all dependant modules.

keepsNodes.title: init
keepsNodes.description: Initializes a Terraform configuration in a directory, downloading necessary plugins and modules.

keepsNodes.title: plan
keepsNodes.description: Shows a preview of the changes Terraform will make to the infrastructure without actually applying the changes.

keepsNodes.title: plan of destroy
keepsNodes.description: Shows the destroy plan.

keepsNodes.title: plan of destroy to a file
keepsNodes.description: Will save a destroy plan into a file.

keepsNodes.title: plan to a file
keepsNodes.description: Plan and save the plan to a file for later review or use.

keepsNodes.title: show plan from a file
keepsNodes.description: Show the execution plan as saved on a given file.

keepsNodes.title: validate
keepsNodes.description: Validates the Terraform configuration files for syntax and formatting errors.

keepsNodes.title: apply
keepsNodes.description: Applies the changes to the infrastructure as defined in the Terraform configuration.

keepsNodes.title: apply (auto-approve)
keepsNodes.description: Applies the changes to the infrastructure as defined in the Terraform configuration.

keepsNodes.title: destroy
keepsNodes.description: Destroys the infrastructure created by Terraform, deleting all resources.

keepsNodes.title: destroy (auto-approve)
keepsNodes.description: Destroys the infrastructure created by Terraform, deleting all resources.

keepsNodes.title: state list
keepsNodes.description: Will show the current state, what resources are applyed.

keepsNodes.title: state show for a resource
keepsNodes.description: Will show extended information for a specific resource.

keepsNodes.title: show for all
keepsNodes.description: Will show informaiton regarding all the applyed resources.

keepsNodes.title: refresh
keepsNodes.description: Refreshes the state of the resources managed by Terraform, updating the state file with the current status.

keepsNodes.title: graph
keepsNodes.description: Generates a visual representation (Graphviz DOT format) of the Terraform configuration.

keepsNodes.title: graph to a file
keepsNodes.description: Will save the graph into a file.

keepsNodes.title: webgraphviz.com address
keepsNodes.description: Paste the graph output to visualy show it using this website.

keepsNodes.title: output specific value
keepsNodes.description:
Will show the value of a specific output.
Should be executed after a 'terraform apply' command.

keepsNodes.title: output
keepsNodes.description:
Displays the values of outputs defined in the Terraform configuration.
Should be executed after a 'terraform apply' command.
